Uses of Class
com.codename1.ui.TextField

Packages that use TextField
com.codename1.components Generic elaborate components that make use of both UI elements and storage. 
com.codename1.ui Main widget package containing the component/container "composite" similar both in terminology and design to Swing/AWT. 
com.codename1.ui.html This package is deprecated and used only for legacy support, use the WebBrowser component from the components package.

Methods in com.codename1.ui with parameters of type TextField
static void VirtualKeyboard.setCommitOnDispose(TextField tf, boolean b)
          Indicates whether the VKB should commit changes to the text field when the VKB is closed not via the OK button.
static void VirtualKeyboard.setVKBTint(TextField tf, int tint)
          Sets the tint color for the virtual keyboard when shown on top of this text field see the form tint methods for more information
